questionTitle: If you didn't stay up late, you ...................... get up earlier.
We reached ..................... the village fair that morning.
If I heard from Jack, I ........................ let you know.
Workers in many countries are very proud ..................... May Day.
You and Jack can stay for dinner, can't you? I wish we ........................, but we can't.
The train had left when we arrived ..................... the station.
A new film ........................ here last night.
The plane crashed ..................... the building in front of them.
A New Year's party .......................... at our home every year.
It's very nice ..................... you to be present at my party.
This book .......................... written recently.
Lan seems to be ..................... a hurry.
People don't learn languages overnight. Languages ......................... learned overnight.
David is in love ..................... Mary, but Mary doesn't love him.
His room is rather small compared ............................ yours.
Betty started school ..................... the age of 6.
Vietnam is ..................... in Southeast Asia .
We often go to the school library to read or to ............................
It is now ..................... for you to rebuild your house.
